iti43:1.1: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti43:2.1: â€œThere is, mendicants, an unborn, unproduced, unmade, and unconditioned.
iti43:2.2: If there were no unborn, unproduced, unmade, and unconditioned, then you would find no escape here from the born, produced, made, and conditioned.
